name: SID 23 Read Memory By Address - Production-Ready Test Suite
description: Comprehensive production-grade test suite for UDS Service 0x23 (ReadMemoryByAddress) per ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 11.3. Covers all automotive ECU testing scenarios including ALFID parsing (1-8 byte), session validation, multi-level security access, memory region boundaries, overflow detection, error recovery, service interactions, and real-world automotive fault conditions. Designed for production ECU validation in automotive sector.

requests.description: [CAT-01: SESSION VALIDATION] TC-01.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-01.2: Read in DEFAULT Session - Expect NRC 0x22 (ConditionsNotCorrect)
TC-01.3: Enter EXTENDED Session (0x03)
TC-01.4: Read 256 bytes from Public Calibration (0x00100000) in EXTENDED - Expect Positive Response 0x63
TC-01.5: Reset to Default for Programming Session Test
TC-01.6: Enter PROGRAMMING Session (0x02)
TC-01.7: Read 16 bytes in PROGRAMMING Session - Expect Positive Response 0x63
[CAT-02: ALFID PARSING] TC-02.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-02.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-02.3: ALFID 0x11 (1-byte addr, 1-byte size) - Read 4 bytes from addr 0x10 - Expect NRC 0x31 (Out of Range for small address)
TC-02.4: ALFID 0x22 (2-byte addr, 2-byte size) - Read 4 bytes from 0x1000 - Tests 16-bit addressing
TC-02.5: ALFID 0x33 (3-byte addr, 3-byte size) - Read 16 bytes from 0x001000 - Tests 24-bit addressing
TC-02.6: ALFID 0x44 (4-byte addr, 4-byte size) - Read 64 bytes - Standard 32-bit automotive ECU format
TC-02.7: ALFID 0x24 (4-byte addr, 2-byte size) - Mixed format common in automotive - Read 256 bytes
TC-02.8: ALFID 0x12 (1-byte addr, 2-byte size) - Read from 0x10, expect NRC 0x31 (out of range for 1-byte address)
TC-02.9: ALFID 0x41 (4-byte addr, 1-byte size) - Inverse asymmetric format
[CAT-03: MESSAGE LENGTH VALIDATION] TC-03.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-03.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-03.3: Empty data (no ALFID) - Expect NRC 0x13 (IncorrectMessageLength)
TC-03.4: Only ALFID byte, no address/size - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-03.5: ALFID 0x44 but only 3 address bytes (needs 8) - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-03.6: ALFID 0x44 with address but missing size bytes - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-03.7: ALFID 0x22 missing 1 size byte - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-03.8: ALFID 0x24 missing 1 size byte - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-03.9: ALFID 0x44 with extra trailing bytes - Expect NRC 0x13 or ignored
TC-03.10: Invalid ALFID 0x00 (zero nibbles) - Expect NRC 0x13
TC-03.11: ALFID 0xF0 (15-byte size, 0-byte addr) - Invalid format - Expect NRC 0x13
[CAT-04: SECURITY ACCESS VALIDATION] TC-04.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-04.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-04.3: Read Flash Code (0x00001000) - Security Level 1 Required - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-04.4: Read OEM Calibration (0x00200000) - Security Level 1 Required - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-04.5: Read RAM (0x00300000) - Security Level 1 Required - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-04.6: Request Security Seed (SID 0x27 SubFn 0x01) - Expect Positive Response with Seed
TC-04.7: Send Security Key [0xB7, 0x6E, 0xA6, 0x77] - Expect Positive Response (Unlocked)
TC-04.8: Read Flash Code AFTER Security Unlock - Expect Positive Response 0x63
TC-04.9: Read OEM Calibration AFTER Security Unlock - 32 bytes - Expect Positive Response
TC-04.10: Read RAM AFTER Security Unlock - 64 bytes - Expect Positive Response
[CAT-05: SECURITY SESSION RESET] TC-05.1: Reset to Default (Security Lock Reset)
TC-05.2: Enter EXTENDED Session (Fresh - Security Should Be Locked)
TC-05.3: Verify Security Re-Locked After Session Reset - Expect NRC 0x33
[CAT-06: OUT OF RANGE VALIDATION] TC-06.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-06.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-06.3: Invalid address 0xFFFFFFFF - Expect NRC 0x31 (RequestOutOfRange)
TC-06.4: Address 0x00500000 (beyond defined memory map) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-06.5: Address 0x01000000 (unmapped region) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-06.6: Size = 0 bytes (invalid) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-06.7: Integer Overflow Test - Address near max + large size - Expect NRC 0x31
[CAT-07: MEMORY BOUNDARY VALIDATION] TC-07.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-07.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-07.3: Read crosses Flash→Calibration boundary (0x000FFF00 + 512) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-07.4: Read crosses Calibration→OEM boundary (0x001FFF00 + 512) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-07.5: Read crosses OEM→RAM boundary - Expect NRC 0x31 (also needs security)
[CAT-08: RESERVED REGION ACCESS] TC-08.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-08.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-08.3: Read from Reserved region start (0x00000000) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-08.4: Read from Reserved region middle (0x00000010) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-08.5: Read from Reserved region end (0x00000FF0) - Expect NRC 0x31
TC-08.6: Read crosses Reserved→Flash boundary - Expect NRC 0x31
[CAT-09: LARGE DATA READS] TC-09.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-09.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-09.3: Read 1024 bytes (1KB) from Public Calibration - Tests buffer handling
TC-09.4: Read 4096 bytes (4KB) using ALFID 0x24 - Tests large transfer
TC-09.5: Read 65536 bytes (64KB) - Tests maximum practical read size
[CAT-10: PROGRAMMING SESSION TESTS] TC-10.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-10.2: Enter PROGRAMMING Session (0x02)
TC-10.3: Read Public Cal in PROGRAMMING - Should work (public region)
TC-10.4: Read Flash Code in PROGRAMMING without security - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-10.5: Request Security Seed in PROGRAMMING Session
TC-10.6: Send Security Key in PROGRAMMING Session
TC-10.7: Read Flash Code in PROGRAMMING after unlock - Expect Positive Response
[CAT-11: SEQUENTIAL READ VERIFICATION] TC-11.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-11.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-11.3: Sequential Read 1 - 4 bytes from offset 0x00
TC-11.4: Sequential Read 2 - 4 bytes from offset 0x04
TC-11.5: Sequential Read 3 - 4 bytes from offset 0x08
TC-11.6: Sequential Read 4 - 4 bytes from offset 0x0C
TC-11.7: Verify Combined - Read all 16 bytes in one request (should match sequential)
[CAT-12: EDGE CASES - BOUNDARY BYTES] TC-12.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-12.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-12.3: Read 1 byte (minimum size) from Public Calibration start
TC-12.4: Read 1 byte from Public Calibration end (0x001FFFFF)
TC-12.5: Request Security Seed for boundary tests
TC-12.6: Send Security Key
TC-12.7: Read 1 byte from Flash Code start (0x00001000) with security
TC-12.8: Read 1 byte from Flash Code end (0x000FFFFF) with security
[CAT-13: SERVICE INTERACTION - TESTER PRESENT] TC-13.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-13.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-13.3: First Read - Verify session active
TC-13.4: Send Tester Present (SID 0x3E SubFn 0x80) - Keep Session Alive
TC-13.5: Second Read after Tester Present - Session should still be active
TC-13.6: Another Tester Present - Maintain session for long operations
TC-13.7: Third Read - Continuous session maintenance verified
[CAT-14: SERVICE INTERACTION - READ/WRITE VERIFY] TC-14.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-14.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-14.3: Request Security Seed for Read-Modify-Write
TC-14.4: Send Security Key
TC-14.5: Read 4 bytes from RAM (0x00300000) - Initial value capture
TC-14.6: Write 4 bytes to RAM (SID 0x3D) - [0xAA, 0xBB, 0xCC, 0xDD]
TC-14.7: Verify Read after Write - Should return [0xAA, 0xBB, 0xCC, 0xDD]
[CAT-15: MULTI-REGION READ WORKFLOW] TC-15.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-15.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-15.3: Request Security Seed for multi-region access
TC-15.4: Send Security Key
TC-15.5: Read 256 bytes from Public Calibration (Region 1)
TC-15.6: Read 128 bytes from Flash Code (Region 2)
TC-15.7: Read 64 bytes from OEM Calibration (Region 3)
TC-15.8: Read 32 bytes from RAM (Region 4)
[CAT-16: ERROR RECOVERY - SESSION] TC-16.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-16.2: Attempt read in DEFAULT - Expect NRC 0x22
TC-16.3: ERROR RECOVERY - Enter EXTENDED Session after failure
TC-16.4: Retry read after session recovery - Expect success
[CAT-17: ERROR RECOVERY - SECURITY] TC-17.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-17.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-17.3: Attempt protected read - Expect NRC 0x33
TC-17.4: ERROR RECOVERY - Request security seed
TC-17.5: ERROR RECOVERY - Send correct security key
TC-17.6: Retry protected read after security unlock - Expect success
[CAT-18: ERROR RECOVERY - INVALID KEY] TC-18.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-18.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-18.3: Request Security Seed
TC-18.4: Send INVALID Security Key - Expect NRC 0x35 (InvalidKey)
TC-18.5: ERROR RECOVERY - Request new seed after failure
TC-18.6: ERROR RECOVERY - Send CORRECT key after failure
TC-18.7: Read protected memory after recovery - Expect success
[CAT-19: STRESS TEST - RAPID READS] TC-19.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-19.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-19.3: Rapid Read 1 - 8 bytes
TC-19.4: Rapid Read 2 - 8 bytes (100ms gap)
TC-19.5: Rapid Read 3 - 8 bytes (100ms gap)
TC-19.6: Rapid Read 4 - 8 bytes (100ms gap)
TC-19.7: Rapid Read 5 - 8 bytes (100ms gap)
[CAT-20: FINAL VALIDATION] TC-20.1: Reset to Default Session
TC-20.2: Enter EXTENDED Session
TC-20.3: Final Validation Read - Public Calibration
TC-20.4: Final Reset to Default Session - Test Suite Complete

metadata.author: UDS Simulator - Automotive Testing Suite
metadata.description: Production-grade test suite for SID 0x23 (ReadMemoryByAddress) covering all automotive ECU testing requirements. Implements comprehensive validation per ISO 14229-1:2020 including ALFID parsing, session management, multi-level security access, memory region boundaries, error recovery procedures, and service interactions.

memoryRegions.name: Calibration Public
memoryRegions.description: Public calibration data - no security required

nrcCoverage.0x13: Incorrect Message Length or Invalid Format

positiveResponseConditions.description: Conditions required for successful SID 0x23 execution
conditions: ECU in Extended Diagnostic Session (0x03) or Programming Session (0x02)
Valid ALFID byte with nibbles in range [1-15]
Message length matches ALFID specification (2 + addrLen + sizeLen)
Memory address exists within defined memory map regions
Requested size > 0 and does not cause integer overflow
Read range stays entirely within single memory region
Required security level unlocked for protected regions
Security access has not timed out

0x13.name: Incorrect Message Length or Invalid Format
conditions: Message length does not match ALFID specification
Address or size bytes missing from request

0x31.name: Request Out of Range
conditions: Memory address not in any defined region
Read range crosses memory region boundary
Memory region marked as not accessible (reserved)

0x33.name: Security Access Denied
conditions: Memory region requires security but not unlocked
Security level unlocked is lower than required

recovery: Send SID 0x10 0x03 to enter Extended Session
If still failing, check for session timeout and use Tester Present (0x3E)
Calculate key from seed using algorithm
Be aware of lockout after multiple failures
Verify address is within valid memory map
Reduce size to stay within single region
Check for integer overflow in address calculation

required.name: Diagnostic Session Control
required.purpose: Must enter Extended (0x03) or Programming (0x02) session before SID 0x23

required.name: Security Access
required.purpose: Required for protected memory regions (security level > 0)

supporting.name: Tester Present
supporting.purpose: Prevent session timeout during long operations or processing delays

complementary.name: Write Memory By Address
complementary.purpose: Opposite operation - used in read-modify-write patterns

complementary.name: Read Data By Identifier
complementary.purpose: Alternative for structured data reads vs raw memory

notes: Test Suite v2.0.0: Production-grade comprehensive test coverage for SID 0x23 (ReadMemoryByAddress) per ISO 14229-1:2020 Section 11.3. Contains 108 test requests across 20 categories covering: Session Validation (DEFAULT/EXTENDED/PROGRAMMING), ALFID Parsing (7 formats from 0x11-0x44), Message Length Validation, Security Access with unlock/lock cycles, Security Session Reset verification, Out of Range scenarios (invalid address, zero size, overflow), Memory Boundary validation, Reserved Region access denial, Large Data Reads (1KB-64KB), Programming Session tests, Sequential Read verification, Edge Cases (1-byte reads at boundaries), Service Interactions (Tester Present, Read/Write verify), Multi-Region workflows, Error Recovery procedures (session, security, invalid key), and Stress Testing with rapid reads. Implements all NRCs: 0x13, 0x22, 0x31, 0x33, 0x35, 0x72. Tests 5 memory regions from 0x00000000-0x003FFFFF. Uses security key [0xB7, 0x6E, 0xA6, 0x77]. Designed for real automotive ECU validation.
